title: Man of Iron
overview: In Warsaw in 1980, the Communist Party sends disgruntled radio reporter Winkel to Gda≈Ñsk to dig up dirt on the shipyard strikers - particularly on Maciek Tomczyk, an independent labour union leader whose father was killed in the December 1970 protests. Posing as sympathetic, Winkel interviews the people surrounding Tomczyk, including his detained wife, Agnieszka.
